name: The Waiting Game (Paul Czege)
description:
The Waiting Game is a storytelling game for two or more players about your one regular course of action for getting what you want: inaction. You hesitate. You talk yourself out of stuff. You procrastinate. You hope. You wait.

Okay, sometimes you do fail at inaction. Sometimes you actually do something. But even then, probably you're not prepared.

It was created for the #YourMoveJam.

Suggested price $4.00. Minimum price $3.00. But if the price of this game is a hardship to you, please email me at paul@halfmeme.com, or DM me on Twitter @paulczege, and I'll get you a download key, no questions asked.
